Combat.description: The player may be expected to fight enemies/bosses with less equipment than usual.

ShinesparkTrick.description: The player may be expected to use shinesparking to traverse a room (beyond what's expected in vanilla).

Knowledge.description: The player may be expected to know alternative enemy/block weaknesses.

HeatRuns.description: The player may be expected to traverse a room while taking damage from the environment (Heat/Lava/Cold/Electric)

WallJump.description: The player may be expected to wall jump to traverse rooms vertically.

JBJ.description: The player may be expected to place bombs midair and then get hit by them to gain more height.

StandOnFrozenEnemies.description: The player may be expected to stand on frozen enemies to traverse a room (beyond what's expected in vanilla).
